name: The GOODMEN
description:
The GOODMEN is a simplistic little action game with random dungeons you can infinitely play through for points and score! With easy-to-follow combat, and random items, treasure and enemies to be found, luck and skill will be your keys to getting the highest score possible through this endless series of dungeons.

- 3 Characters to pick with different stats altering replayability

- Random weapon pickups provide a fun challenge

- A short experience that doesn't need overexplanation or lore or anything, just good old quick fun. Although, there is a tutorial...

- Song remixed by Disturbirds Music - UNDERGROUND

The game itself is free, but you can donate to further support my work! Check my twitter @ZweiLuke !

This was a fun short project, and teached me quite a bit the ups and downs of Game Maker, but it was mostly made for fun, hope others enjoy, as i also find myself playing this short game for fun every now and then, seeing how far i can get. Do post your "High Scores", i'd be happy to see them!
